title: Belly pork with piccalilli purée
description: Belly pork recipes tend to benefit from a slow cook. Sat Baines uses a water bath for his creation.Equipment and preparation: You’ll need a temperature-controlled water bath and sous vide bags.
ingredients: 4 slices shonka ham (available from specialist butchers)
4 large cauliflower florets, thinly sliced on a mandolin
